content: *double thick fabric ensures your pumpkins can be stuffed firmly for the perkiest of pumpkins these can be hand knit or machine knit one mini skein in sock weight is all you need per pumpkin* **measurements** width 4 ½ 11 5 cm height 3 7 5 cm **materials** 92 yards 100 meters of fingering / sock weight yarn color a pumpkin body 1 yard of fingering / sock weight yarn color b stem we used cape may fiber mini skein sock 92 yards / 20 gram 75% superwash merino 25% nylon colors shown… top tier crispy leaves and apple tart middle tier fright night and season of the witch bottom tier quartz beach haunted victorian and radium girls for the stem we used color pineland **tools** - set of 5 us size 6 4 mm dpns or a circular to work the magic loop method - tapestry needle - scissors **notions** - polyfil stuffing about 24 grams **gauge** 24 sts 38 rounds / row = 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge
